message: I've been looking around and haven't been able to find much for the backend side of a calendar or event system.  I've found a few gems for generating a calendar view (event_calendar, table_builder), but they're just view focused.  It seems like this would be a common enough problem that something should be out there.
Found this https://github.com/rubyredrick/ri_cal, which likely can do what I need, but looks pretty heavy.
